2083

72 rolls _ 32 balls

Description: A single location provides for the preservation and on-going collection of toilet rolls, the cardboard is of an industrial weight entirely disproportionate to its function.

Meanwhile... from a completely unrelated set of conditions (during the same time period), an unusually large quantity of snooker balls became available for consideration.

Eventually the rolls and the balls were introduced and are now inseperable.

The composition of the piece is numerous as it adheres to a simple set of parameters.

+ info upon request

  • A piece of chalk
